nodes.bodyText:
Nice that you have this changelog!
I didn't see context in Encounter: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/encounter.html. Perhaps you could use subject instead?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@
+---
+type: add
+issue: 1772
+title: "The JPA server now allows chained searches on the `_type` parameter. For example, the following
+   could be used to find all Encounters with a context of type Group: `Encounter?context._type=Group`."

nodes.bodyText: Maybe you can refactor this into a method like you did for newInvalidResourceTypeException so it's a bit easier to read
